name: Become A Star
description:
In Become a Star, play as a musician on his journey to success in this virtual reality rhythm game! Pick your instrument (guitar or drums), prepare your concerts on stage, and feel the crowd vibrate to the rhythm of original songs! The game will be available in early access on September 5th.



The players can choose between two different game modes :

- A fun arcade mode, where you can select the songs and concert halls, and simply enjoy the music and the gameplay. This mode will be available with early access, and more songs will be added as the development continues. Customize your concerts: pick indoor or outdoor scenes, launch visual effects of your choice, and perform in a small bar or the famous Bunker Palace.

- A story mode, where the player embodies a musician on his path to success, starting from the creation of the band to the biggest concert halls. We're planning this mode for the full game release.

Game features


-Play Drums Or Guitar

-Prepare For Live Performances

-See the Audience React to Your Performance

-Discover the band's Original Music
